decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of one year from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Elevations with measurements 002, undated; Proposed floorplan 003, undated; KK-101 1, dated 09/10/2015; 1390-P-021 Rev P6, dated 18.09.15; Design & Access Statement 1201_T_DA1, dated October 2015; - received 04/11/2015
C0019 L900 Revision C1, dated 13.11.2015; C0019 L901 Revision C1, dated 13.11.2015; - received 21/12/2015) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The sales cabin shall be erected for a temporary period only, with it to be entirely removed from the site before 12 months from the date of this permission.
description: Erection of a temporary sales cabin with associated parking and railings
